tool_description: This returns a list of all current Crypto/NFT/Blockchain games, along with pretty much all the usefull info you would need for them! including the site link, socials (twitter/discord/medium, and more), team details, token, chain, roadmap, appstore link, platforms available to play, their location and the development company, genre of the game and even funding details as whether the game has launched or when they plan to launch! SO you dont need any other API!
title: Crypto Games List API

api_list.name: Get Games
api_list.description: this end point just returns a list of all the items from the API database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-games-list-api.p.rapidapi.com/items"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-games-list-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
